play-self-sounds.name: Play Self Achievement Sounds
play-self-sounds.hint: Play a sound if you are awarded an achievement.

self-sound-volume.name: Self Achievement Sound Volume
self-sound-volume.hint: The volume of the sound played when you are awarded an achievement.

hide-unearned.name: Hide Unearned Achievements
hide-unearned.hint: Completely hide unearned achievements from the player. (This takes precedence over the cloak setting.)

cloak-unearned.name: Cloak Unearned Achievements
cloak-unearned.hint: Players can see that there is an achievement, but not what it is. (This is overridden by the hide setting.)

show-only-to-awarded-user.name: Show Only to Awarded User
show-only-to-awarded-user.hint: Show the achievement message only to the user who gained it.

achievements-sheet.import-achievements: Overwrite current achievements with export data from clipboard
achievements-sheet.no-achievements-added: No achievements have been added yet.

messages.duplicate-id: An achievement with that ID already exists.
messages.no-achievements-in-clipboard: No achievements found in the clipboard.

import-achievements.title: Import Achievements
import-achievements.content: This will overwrite all existing achievements with data from your clipboard. Are you sure?
